title: IAR Donation
body:
On September 20th, we hosted a fundraiser for International Animal Rescue to help with their “Rebuild the Refuge” project in the Costa Rican Rainforest.

Learn about the project here: https://www.internationalanimalrescue.org/projects/howler-monkeys
Q&A w/ Finn Brownbill (member of IAR) here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JUKcJZmWRvI

Thanks to everyone who donated, we were able to raise $2,405.07!
Great work everybody! Although this is an amazing accomplishment, our original goal was to reach $5,000 that we would match to make a final donation of $10,000.

Although we didn’t reach that goal, you guys still have a chance to make that donation possible!
Vote YES if you would like us to complete our donation goal and make a donation of $10,000 to IAR. 
Vote NO if you would like us to make a donation of $2,405.07 to IAR.

If we vote to make the $10,000 donation, IAR has kindly offered to name an animal enclosure after Altrucoin.

Charity Updates:
There will be another charity vote coming soon to vote on.
All of the fundraiser giveaway winners have been contacted via email or telegram.
For everyone who won NFTs, they will be sent out soon, and we will make an announcement once they have been sent.
If you have any charity suggestions you would like to see in future voting polls, please leave a comment on our suggestion box: https://forms.gle/vcQUNELkKBtNdjtg8 or in the charity text channel in our discord: https://discord.gg/ENFc8fh9
author: 0xB7cd5Ab36a99b9eF4BC0f445a812A1c7d0FfEf0E
